twitter.content:
Taking time to recharge isn't selfish—it's essential. What's your go-to self-care activity? Share below! #CaregiverSelfCare #GiveCare

#caregiving #support #community

image_url.name: GiveCare

visual_modes.name: framed_portrait
visual_modes.description: Intimate family moments with signature tan border frame
visual_modes.lighting: soft natural light, golden hour feel
visual_modes.composition: close-up to medium shots, authentic expressions

border.style: thick tan border, soft-edged, matte finish

visual_modes.prompt_template:
Documentary-style photograph showing {scene_description}.
Shot with natural lighting, authentic emotions, intimate framing.
Professional photography with thick tan (#D7B899) border frame.
Warm color grading, soft vignette edges, high quality composition.

visual_modes.name: lifestyle_scene
visual_modes.description: Wider environmental shots showing caregiving in context
visual_modes.composition: medium to wide shots, contextual storytelling
visual_modes.finish: soft grain, editorial feel, no border
visual_modes.prompt_template:
Lifestyle photography capturing {scene_description}.
Environmental portrait style with contextual storytelling.
Warm diffuse lighting, soft grain, editorial quality.
Authentic home setting, genuine moments, professional composition.

visual_modes.name: illustrative_concept
visual_modes.description: Soft illustrations for abstract concepts and guidance
visual_modes.style: minimal detail, impressionist edges, gentle forms
visual_modes.prompt_template:
Soft watercolor illustration depicting {scene_description}.
Gentle brush strokes, muted earth tones, minimal detail.
Peaceful composition, impressionist style, caring atmosphere.
Digital painting technique with soft edges and calming palette.

image_url.story:
GiveCare was founded to support the invisible labor of family caregivers.
Our mission is to bring emotional, logistical, and informational clarity through human-centered AI tools.
image_url.positioning: Companion for caregivers | Human-centered tech for emotional + logistical load | Where policy meets real life

content_units.style: cohesive storytelling with synchronized text and visuals
content_units.visual_text_harmony: visuals should emotionally reflect and amplify the text message

image: Always include thick tan/warm beige border for brand recognition
Use editorial vignette style with soft focus edges

style_rules: Use second-person 'you' to speak directly to caregivers
Keep sentences short and clear (15-20 words max)
Prefer active voice; cut fluff and jargon
Show empathy and understanding in every post
Ensure visual and text elements tell the same story
topics: Navigating healthcare systems as a caregiver

linkedin.content:
Being a caregiver means constantly giving, and it's easy to overlook your own needs. Let's pause for a moment and consider how vital self-care truly is in caregiving roles. I'd love to hear your favorite methods or routines that help you recharge and rejuvenate. Comment below and let's inspire one another! #CaregivingCommunity #SelfCare #GiveCare

#caregiving #support #community
